description: Source code for a Flutter-based calculator frontend application with custom theming, animated display, keypad, and calculator logic.

classes.name: OceanPalette
classes.description: Defines a color palette with ocean-inspired colors used throughout the app.

classes.name: CalculatorApp
classes.description: Root widget setting up the application's theme and home page.

classes.name: CalculatorHomePage
classes.description: Main calculator widget with state management, display, and keypad.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: Header widget with title and accent underline.

classes.name: _DisplayPanel
classes.description: Displays ongoing expression, current input, and result with animations.

classes.name: _Keypad
classes.description: Layout for calculator buttons arranged in a grid.

classes.name: _CalcButton

methods.description: Entry point configuring and running the Flutter app.

methods.description: Builds the MaterialApp with theme and home page.
